reviews.text: I stayed in so many hostels across europe a few years ago that I had a preconceived idea of this place. I was completely wrong. This is the cleanest, friendliest hostel I have ever stayed in. My husband and I actually booked a private room (which never happened when I was in Europe), so you may think that made a difference, but I disagree. We saw the dorm rooms and they were great, too. Our room was super clean and very easy to use. yes, the mattresses are thin, but I here it is like that everwhere.
reviews.title: best hostel EVER!

likes.disliked: — thin walls and far trek to tourist sites

reviews.text: the workers made the real difference - so helpful and so friendly. they booked our overnight train tickets to xi'an and our flight back. additionally, they have little cards sitting right by the door listing the most popular tourist attractions in english and chinese so you can just take them and hand them to a taxi driver. I loved this. and you need it - we only met one taxi driver in our weeklong stay that spoke any english. We booked the hike to the great wall and then realized my husband forgot a backpack. one of the workers (Danielle - super nice) lent us her personal backpack! wow.
reviews.title: Great Budget Place To Stay

reviews.text: I would not hesitate to recommend this place - especially as more of a budget hotel for couples who want to pay less than 20 bucks a night for a clean, friendly place to stay! then you can spend all your money on fun stuff!
